1. Valve reveals what games made the most money on Steam in 2024  Neowin
  2. Only 15% of all Steam users' time was spent playing games released in 2024  PC Gamer
  3. Marvel Rivals joins Manor Lords, Palworld, and Helldivers 2 as one of Steam's best-selling and most-played new releases of 2024 despite launching at the end of the year  Gamesradar
  4. Steam released a record number of games in 2024 — over 18,000 new titles were added to the platform  Tom's Hardware
  5. The year's Steam Replay reveals 85% of Steam users in 2024 spent time playing games released in 2023 or earlier  Eurogamer
